name: ayah_recitations
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool quran_com.
Tool description: The default API of Quran.com website
API description: Fetches the list of recitations for a specific Ayah by its key and recitation ID.

recitation_id.description: Recitation Id, you can get list of all ayah by ayah recitations using this endpoint #endpoint:HLbauN2sdGitPQPPL

ayah_key.description: The key of the Ayah, which is a combination of the Surah number and Ayah number (e.g., '1:1' for the first Ayah of the first Surah).
